channel.title: CVE Feed for yourownprogrammer -- YOP Poll
channel.description: The latest CVEs for yourownprogrammer -- YOP Poll

item.title: CVE-2023-6109|2024-08-02T08:21:17.742Z -- yourownprogrammer -- yop%20poll
item.description: The YOP Poll plugin for WordPress is vulnerable to a race condition in all versions up to, and including, 6.5.26. This is due to improper restrictions on the add() function. This makes it possible for unauthenticated attackers to place multiple votes on a single poll even when the poll is set to one vote per person.
